title: IG Trading: Spread Betting, CFDs, Forex & Stocks
description:
76% of retail clients lose money, please consider affordability.**

Discover the state-of-the-art spread betting, CFD and forex trading app from the world’s No.1 spread betting and CFD provider.* Trade over 16,000 financial markets with ease, wherever you are – including forex, shares, indices and commodities.

Access exclusive data and expert analysis day or night, with live prices available even before you log in. IG’s app is built to fit around you and regularly updated to suit your changing needs, so you can be sure you’re getting the best possible trading experience.

TRADE OPPORTUNITIES
- Spread bet, buy and sell shares, plus trade forex and CFDs – all from one advanced online trading platform
- Forex: over 90 forex pairs including EUR/USD and GBP/USD, with spreads from just 0.6 points
- Shares: share trading on a huge range of global stocks, like Apple, BP and Google 
- Indices: 24-hour trading on the FTSE 100, Wall St, Germany 30 and many more
- Commodities: 27 major commodities to choose from, including gold, silver, copper and oil 
- Cryptocurrencies: bitcoin trading, plus ether, ripple, NEO and more
- Other markets: interest rates, sectors and more

ANALYSE TRENDS 
- Access interactive charts – pinch to zoom, swipe to scroll
- Apply a range of technical indicators and drawings to help identify market movements
- Search upcoming events and get live Reuters news

REACT TO THE MARKETS 
- Respond instantly to market movements with price alerts 
- Keep track of your positions easily
- Trade CFDs with direct market access
- Manage your risk with a range of stops and limits 
- Keep track of your open positions with ease
- Trade shares and forex CFDs with direct market access

FUND AND DEAL SECURELY
- Benefit from secure 256-bit SSL encryption technology
- Practise trading the markets without risking your capital using your free demo account

VIEW EVENTS
- Stay on top of financial events with our Reuters newsfeed 
- Use our daily economic calendar to plan your daily strategy

SHARE DEALING FOR UK & IRELAND 
- Buy and sell thousands of stocks
- Access real-time prices from multiple venues

Start trading on the move. Download the IG mobile app today.

* Based on revenue excluding FX (published financial statements, February 2018). 
** For ESMA regulated accounts only.

Spread betting is only offered in the UK. Share dealing is offered in the UK and Ireland.
Your capital is at risk.

title: City Index: Spread Betting, CFD and FX Trading

title: Sporting Index: Spread Betting on Sport & Football
description:
The Sporting Index app offers the best sports spread & fixed odds betting experience on mobile.
Sporting Index have been leading the field in the cutting-edge world of Sports Spread Betting for the last 25 years.
Our game just got more expansive, we have now also moved into fixed odds betting with our brand new odds website. Our heritage is spread betting, our future is all betting. 
The brand new Sporting Index sports spread betting native application offers the best spread betting experience at your fingertips and on the move, combining the exciting world of sports with a spread bet. 
With Sporting Index you can choose from the widest range of sports spread bets around, with thousands of markets available across all your favourite sports like football, horse racing, cricket, rugby union, darts, golf, tennis, rugby league, and many more.
Sporting Index Spread Betting App is now using technology that is native to your phone and has brand new features:
-	Ability to set Fingerprint login for quicker and more secure access to your account

-	New UI design with lighter brand colours making it easier to read our markets on your mobile phone screen. 

-	Faster speed – due to the optimised native technology we are now using, the performance improvements mean the app will load markets and prices much quicker

-	Quick betslip – we have now added markets to all homepages and have a Quick betslip function which will allow customers to get a bet off quicker. 

-	Swipe changing of screens making the interface easier to switch between screens on the app. 

-	Improved navigation – on certain sports we have improved the navigation with less swiping, market groups for all sports and horse racing ordered by a time basis, showing next off. 
 
Also, we have kept the other features that make our app great.
-	Access the comprehensive Sporting Index training centre to learn more about different spread betting markets
-	New customers can sign up and create a new account from within the app to be up and running very quickly
-	Access help and support from our UK team

title: Spread Betting - Global Forex Trading Platform
description:
Spread Betting: A Global Forex Trading Platform

Download to trade with competitive spreads on hundreds of CFDs and Forex trading markets.

Take advantage of online trading opportunities:

•	Trade a variety of financial markets around the world, around the clock.
•	Enjoy a maximum-security trading platform
•	Never miss a trading opportunity!

Start in 3 easy steps:
Download the app, create an account and start trading! Easy…

Our #1 Spread Betting App offers:

•	Bond trading
•	Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading
•	Futures and options
•	Trade on Metal prices such as gold, silver, copper +
•	Trade on commodity prices such as oil, gas, wheat +
•	Trade international indices: UK100, Nasdaq, Germany 30 and Australia 200 
•	Well over 1000 international stocks from companies in the UK, U.S, Europe, Asia and Australia
•	Multiple trading markets such as CFD Trading, cryptocurrency trading, forex trading, and trade spread betting.

New to Spread Betting? Here is what you should know

Spread betting deals with legal staking, where profits and losses are calculated according to the level at which the value of a particular asset changes from the spread quoted by the trading platform. In spread trading, participants do not actually own the underlying asset they trade on, such as a stock or commodity.

The “spread” is a term used to refer to two prices— the bid price and the offer price. These two prices are always woven around the basic market price.

The spread broker advertises their bid and offer prices.  You, as the trader, can choose to invest on either price.  The outcome is decided according to the initial price being higher/lower than what you chose to invest on.

Spread betting allows you to trade on the price movements or variations on a great number of financial markets, with indices, shares, stock, commodities, and currencies.

Try the app today and get:

	An award-winning platform and modern technology 
	Swift, easy payments and highly secure withdrawals
	Exceptional trade execution, risk management and honest pricing
	Over twenty years of experience in spread betting, CFD, and forex trades
	An experienced relationship management for insight and trading supports


Some of the things our app allows users to do include:

	Reviewing trade and order history 
	Live pricing of data to monitor chart prices
	Checking recent prices and market variations
	Tightening spreads from 0.5 points on forex pairs

	Quick opening and closing of positions with faster and simpler trading tickets

Getting Started

Every account gets a FREE demo account to practice spread betting, CFD trading, and forex trading.

Download now and start trading today!

# Info

Breakout trading strategies are one of the most popular Forex strategies used by traders. They are primarily used to capture moves in the early stages of a trend when a currency pair is seen to move beyond a predefined level in the market.

This level can be a previous level of support /resistance or a move out of an acknowledge market range that has defined previous trading boundaries. 

The completion of chart patterns, highs and lows in the market or even the preceding trading session can all provide situations for breakouts to occur. The central concept behind a breakout is to capture the market momentum that accompanies the break.

Hope these apps can help you to get better understanding in Forex Trading Beginner's Guide, then improve your performance in trading.

title: Forex Tutorials - Forex Trading Simulator
description:
Forex Tutorials — Forex Trading Simulator is the premier app for learning the basic of the foreign exchange (forex) currency markets. Beginners and those early in their trading careers might benefit greatly from the information the app offers.
 
The app provides 100% free access to educational materials as well as a trading simulator. The Forex Tutorials platform does not require registration. All functionality, including demo account trading, interactive charts, and other content like educational and training materials, are instantly available once the app is installed. 

Give it a try now! Download the app and get started with a real trading platform in no time at all.


Forex Tutorials — comprehensive guide for beginners

•	The advantages of trading FX
•	Forex Basics: major currency pairs, how to read quotes, and factors that influence exchange rate
•	How to read charts and see trends
•	What are candlesticks?
•	How to open a trade
•	What is leverage and can it be used?
•	Stop losses and take profits
•	Example commodities trade: influences on price
•	Example stock trade: execution, and influences on price
•	Timing: best and worst days to trade
•	Getting Started: choosing a broker and opening a demo account
•	“Going live:” switching from a demo account to a real one
•	Social trading and tips from professionals
•	Account types, trading platforms, fees, and spreads
 

 
Trading Simulator — free forex simulator for beginners

The trading simulator pulls in a live data feed from global financial centers (NYSE, NASDAQ, FWB, etc) and updates your charts in real time on a 1 second tick mark. The simulator allows you to access a complete history of all of your trades and other operations.
 
We are always adding new pairs to our offering. Currently, the following pairs are available:

AUDUSD 
EURUSD
GBPUSD
USDCAD
USDJPY
USDRUB
NZDUSD
XAUUSD
XAGUSD
 
We offer a variety of chart types and charting tools:

Japanese candlestick
Line chart
 
Timeframes:

15 second
5 minute
15 minute
1 hour
8 hour
 
 
Economic Calendar — never miss a beat or get caught off guard
 
Hone your trading strategies with the economic calendar. The calendar automatically updates itself in response to economic event, announcements, and world events that may impact the markets so you are always up-to-date on what’s happening around the world.

Other apps lure beginners in by claiming to be the best option and falsely promising instant profits. We cannot and do not guarantee any such results or any results at all. We take the view that good traders spend real time honing their skills before they starting pulling in profits. 

The FX market is not a game. It’s hard work and we think that a trader has to learn the charts, master strategies, make emotion-free decisions, use believable and trusted source of information, and finally, choose the right forex trading platform for them.
The most important thing to remember is that it is it’s not enough to just take some classes and then start trading. Your career as a trader should be one of constant growth.

We wish you great luck and much success!

DISCLAIMER

Trading foreign currencies, CFDs, and other instruments with leverage carries a significant level of risk and may not be appropriate for everyone. We suggest that you carefully consider whether your personality and personal circumstances are appropriate to begin trading. You may lose money in excess of what you have invested. Information provided by Intamac Technologies Limited in our app, on our website, advertisements, or elsewhere is general in nature and solely intended for information or entertainment purposes. We suggest that you seek independent financial advice and be certain that you understand the risks involved before starting to trade. Trading through an online carries additional risk.

description:

When you decide to invest in forex market so you will have a lot of questions time by time: How is current trend of market? it's grow up, it's down or side way? The fact is that the market sometime against the majority traders so when you decide trade the forex market, you need a valuables data to know what the majority of traders are doing and decide to trade or exit trade.
You can using Forex Sentiment to invest in Forex, Stock, Coin, Asset management or personal financial. Happy trading!

title: nextmarkets Online Trading
description:
nextmarkets aims to help private investors become sustainably successful and better trained to operate in today's financial markets. To this end, nextmarkets has developed a very easy to use Trading Platform for private investors which covers over 1000 instruments via intuitively driven web and mobile apps. These include CFDs on stock, currency (Forex, FX), bond and commodity markets. 

It is scientifically proven that more than 80 percent of all private investors fail in the capital markets. This has mainly behavioral finance reasons. Human behaviour is sometimes affected by fear, greed and arrogance and this often leads to irrational decisions when dealing with money at the exchange. 

Therefore nextmarkets wanted to develop a platform in which customers are not left out on their own, but their Trading Coaches will train and support users in their everyday trading. With Curated Investing, we will help you to understand the capital markets. nextmarkets customers can choose from more than a dozen coaches. Each of these coaches is a professional in a determined area (for example Stock Trading and Technical Analysis techniques).

The best part: Experts communicate with clients via analyses and transactions directly on the customer's chart. Experience every step of your experts live in the chart. The user most often sees the approach based on chart analysis and which indicators the coach uses. In addition, the expert's comments appear in a kind of "chat monologue", so that subscribers may understand why the coach makes decisions and how the coach analyzes the markets. The customers receive interesting trading ideas and  they also learn about the cause and effect principles and learn how to better analyse the markets. After a few weeks they understand  what is moving the markets and how markets may be mastered. Simply learning by doing.

Finally, users can easily follow the trading ideas of users at a fingertip. Whenever a transaction appears out the trading idea, the user follows that trade with a previously determined quantity. 

nextmarkets offers their users a demo account with virtual 10,000 Euros. And finally, you can trade real money and open your account within minutes.

title: Guide For Learn Forex Trading - Learn to Trade
description:
Guide For Learn Forex Trading - Learn to Trade. Complete Master Guide For Learn Forex Trading - Learn to Trade 2020 - No Ads

Learn everything you need to know to start Trading on the Forex Market today!

In this course I will show you how you can take advantage of currency movements to make profits. We will talk in detail about Currencies, Charts, Bulls & Bears, Short Selling, 

learn how to read the Calendar of Economic events, which is imperative for Fundamental trading on Forex as well as other Financial marketplaces such as NYSE, London Stock Exchange, Futures Exchanges, and more.

I will thoroughly explain how Forex Brokers work, so that you are able to easily separate Honest Brokers from the unreliable ones when you are ready to open a Real Trading account. I even include a FREE guide to selecting a Forex broker, based on my own experience of Real trading.



I will also supply you with a Forex Market Hours wallpaper for YOUR timezone, allowing you to effortlessly monitor the activity of Global Forex Market participants throughout the day.


This course is for complete beginners! All you need is an open mind and a passion to be successful! 

What is Forex? 

Forex, also known as foreign exchange,  FX, or currency trading, is a decentralized global market where all the world's currencies trade. The Forex market is the largest, most liquid market in the world with an average daily trading volume exceeding $5 trillion. All the world's combined stock markets don't even come close to this. But what does that mean to you? Take a closer look at Forex trading and you may find some exciting trading opportunities unavailable with other investments.

Why Learn Forex Trading: Advantages Of Forex Trading

There are many benefits and advantages of Forex Trading for Beginners. Here are just a few reasons why so many people are choosing Forex Trading:

No commissions Forex Trading

No clearing fees, no exchange fees, no government fees, no brokerage fees. Most retail brokers are compensated for their services through something called the “bid/ask spread“.

No middlemen in Forex Trading

Spot currency trading eliminates the middlemen and allows you to trade directly with the market responsible for the pricing on a particular currency pair.

No fixed lot size in Forex Trading

In spot Forex, you determine your own lot or position size. This allows traders to participate with accounts as small as $25.


Forex Trading is a 24-hour market

There is no waiting for the opening bell. From the Monday morning opening in Australia to the afternoon close in New York, the forex market never sleeps. This is awesome for those who want to trade on a part-time basis because you can choose when you want to trade: morning, noon, night, during breakfast, or in your sleep.

No one can corner the market in Forex Trading

The foreign exchange market is so huge and has so many participants that no single entity can control the market price for an extended period of time.

Low Barriers to Entry

You would think that getting started as a currency trader would cost a ton of money. The fact is, when compared to trading stocks, options, or futures, it doesn’t. Online forex brokers offer “mini” and “micro” trading accounts, some with a minimum account deposit of $25.

Topics Included in this App

1- Introduction to Forex Trading to Beginner
2- The Structure of the Forex Market
3- Major Currencies & Trade System
4- Market Analysis in Forex Trading
5- Type of Foreign Exchange Market
6- Benefits of Forex Trading
7- Fundamental Market Forces
8- Technical Indicators in Forex Trading
9- Pattern Study of Trends
10- Technical Strategy in Price Patterns
11- Oscillator Divergences
12- The Role of Inflation in Forex Trading
13- The Commodity Connection
14- Position of Money Management
15- Foreign Exchange Risks
16- Trading Rules
summary: Complete Master Guide For Learn Forex Trading - Learn to Trade 2020 - No Ads
